title: U.S. household expenditure on soaps and detergents 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 92.05 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 78.49 was reported at Year 2011
min_summary: In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
